Posts.Title: Just took my first Tamoxifen pill
Just took my first Tamoxifen pill
I am asking for the pink bus ladies

Posts.Content: I feel silly asking this, with all of the serious issues Sisters here are dealing with. But I am having a hard time with itching. It's intense. I'm scratching my poor breast raw. I am post-lumpectomy since May, post-rads since end of August, on Tamoxifen for about a month. Still using generic Biafine (Prutext) or Aquaphor daily. Anything out there I can take/do for some relief? Thanks, in advance, for taking the time to reply.
Posts.Title: What can I do to stop the itch?

Posts.Content: You amaze me. You are a very special soul. Thoughts and prayers...
Posts.Title: I still need to say thank you.
